internet: Please report internet issues under IT department.
wifi: Internet connectivity problems are handled by IT support.
dorm: Dormitory issues belong to Housing department.
lab: Laboratory equipment problems belong to Lab department.
classroom: Classroom damage should be reported under Facilities.
submit complaint: To submit a complaint, click 'Submit Complaint' on your dashboard, fill in all fields, and click submit.
how to submit complaint: To submit a complaint, go to 'Submit Complaint', fill the form, and click submit.
complaint form: You can submit complaints by filling the form under 'Submit Complaint'.
check status: You can check the status of your complaints by going to 'My Complaints' on your dashboard.
my complaints: Go to 'My Complaints' to see all complaints you submitted and their current status.
reset password: To reset your password, click 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow instructions.
contact admin: For any urgent issues, you can contact your admin via the 'Contact' section.
housing: Housing department handles dormitory and accommodation issues.
facilities: Facilities department handles classrooms, furniture, and general campus maintenance.
it department: IT department handles internet, Wi-Fi, and computer lab issues.
lab equipment: Lab department handles laboratory equipment problems and requests.
student support: For any assistance regarding complaints or accounts, use this chat bot or contact your admin.
faq: I can guide you about submitting complaints, checking status, department issues, and general campus support.
